glosses: to confuse, to mistake one thing for another

examples.translation: I think you've confused me with someone else.
Please don't involve me into this.

examples.text: Yumurta sarısını, unu ve şekeri karıştır.
examples.translation: [and then] Mix the yolk, flour and sugar together.

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish قاریشدیرمق (karıştırmak). Equivalent to karış- (“to blend”) + -tır. Causative form of karışmak. Doublet of Turkish karmak in terms of fourth and fifth meaning. Compare Crimean Tatar qarıştırmaq.
